official_title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating March 29, 1976, as "National Knights of Columbus Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating March 20, 1976, as "National Knights of Columbus Day".
